Candidate is expected to have expertise on Juniper products deployed or to be deployed by providing technical and operational support on network issues, on-going certification, and testing efforts. While the listing of posting is San Francisco based, candidate may be remote but must be a US Citizen.Key Responsibilities: This is a full-time position and may require long work hours or occasional on call weekend support.
